blogPost.excerpt: Run your entire company in one single place — manage projects and tasks, track revenue and expenses, invoice your customers, capture leads and communicate with clients, share knowledge and effectively collaborate with your team.
blogPost.body: Run your entire company in one single place — manage projects and tasks, track revenue and expenses, invoice your customers, capture leads and communicate with clients, share knowledge and effectively collaborate with your team.
blogPost.title: Flowlu - All-in-one productivity tool for effective work management

localize.description: 在一个地方管理您的整个公司 - 管理项目和任务，跟踪收入和支出，为您的客户开具发票，捕捉潜在客户并与客户沟通，分享知识并与您的团队有效协作。
localize.tagline: 一体化生产力工具，有效管理工作

localize.description: 在一個地方管理您的整個公司 - 管理項目和任務，跟蹤收入和支出，爲您的客戶開具發票，捕捉潛在客戶並與客戶溝通，分享知識並與您的團隊有效協作。
localize.tagline: 一體化生產力工具，有效管理工作

previous.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.
previous.title: Crikle - Sell more from anywhere

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基于网络的销售解决方案，将视频通话与定制化的销售指导和可操作的信息采集相结合，快速销售。减少管理，增加销售。您的团队所需的一切，以更快地转化更多的客户。
http://www.crikle.com 是基於網絡的銷售解決方案，將視頻通話與定製化的銷售指導和可操作的信息採集相結合，快速銷售。減少管理，增加銷售。您的團隊所需的一切，以更快地轉化更多的客戶。

next.excerpt: On-demand experts to help you build a better website. Whatever your goals—improving signups, sales, or UX—there’s a genie who can help. Just choose a genie, pay their one time fee, and Jam with them. It’s 1-1 help from experts tackling your exact problem.
next.title: Jam Genies - On-demand expert feedback to help you build a better website

localize.description: 按需专家帮助您建立一个更好的网站。无论您的目标是什么--改善注册、销售或用户体验--都有精灵可以帮助您。只需选择一个精灵，支付他们的一次性费用，然后与他们一起Jam。这是1-1的帮助，由专家解决您的具体问题。
localize.tagline: 按需的专家反馈，帮助你建立一个更好的网站。

localize.description: 按需專家幫助您建立一個更好的網站。無論您的目標是什麼--改善註冊、銷售或用戶體驗--都有精靈可以幫助您。只需選擇一個精靈，支付他們的一次性費用，然後與他們一起Jam。這是1-1的幫助，由專家解決您的具體問題。
localize.tagline: 按需的專家反饋，幫助你建立一個更好的網站。
